name: Sudoku
body:
# Overview
Sudoku is a java application that generates random Sudoku puzzles in three different difficulties. GUI created with swing.

## Features:
* Easy game (4x4)
* Medium game (6x6)
* Hard game (9x9)
* Best time high-score
* Check game as you go
* Solutions are randomly generated and then the board is generated from the solution.

# System Architecture:
![Architecture](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/Architecture.png?raw=true)
# Class Diagram:
![Class Diagram](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/UMLClassDiagram.png?raw=true)
# Screenshots
### New Easy Game:
![New Easy Game](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/NewEasyGame.PNG?raw=true)
### New Medium Game:
![New Medium Game](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/NewMediumGame.PNG?raw=true)
### New Hard Game:
![New Hard Game](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/NewHardGame.PNG?raw=true)
### Check Game:
This functionality checks whether the number is valid against the game, not against the solution.
![Check Game](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/CheckGame.PNG?raw=true)
### Complete:
Checks every box that is to be filled with user input. The box will turn:
   * Red - Empty or invalid number
   * Green - Valid number

Finished Game:
![Complete Game Finish](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/CompleteGameFinish.PNG?raw=true)
Incomplete Game:
![Complete Game Error](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-R3xKyle/blob/master/images/CompleteGameError.PNG?raw=true)

## Design Patterns
### Observer Pattern
   * Grid
   * GridButtons
   * Sudoku

### State Pattern
   * EasySudoku
   * MediumSudoku
   * HardSudoku
